entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Local smoke late this morning and this afternoon. High 19. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:09 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
